name: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Buckaroo$!
description:
The Ren & Stimpy Show: Buckeroo$! is a side-scrolling and vertically scrolling platform game developed by Imagineering for the Nintendo Entertainment System and Super NES. Howard Phillips acted as executive producer.

THQ published both versions of the game. It is one of five THQ titles adapted from the American cartoon series The Ren & Stimpy Show. It is accompanied by The Ren & Stimpy Show: Space Cadet Adventures, The Ren & Stimpy Show: Veediots!, The Ren & Stimpy Show: Fire Dogs and The Ren & Stimpy Show: Time Warp.
